document_data.caption: [[Miklos Selkirk]], a [[Sembia]]n aristocrat and ex-adventurer.
document_data.name: Aristocrat
document_data.mainbody: '''Aristocrat''' was a general term for a member of the wealthy and educated upper class. The rulers of most nations, or those holding some other form of political power, were often aristocrats.
document_data.Training and Education:
Usually, one was born into the role of aristocrat.

Because of their wealth, aristocrats had access to the best schooling and training, and so they could become exceptionally skilled in the fields of their choice.
document_data.Outlook: Most members of this class were strong-willed individuals.
document_data.Abilities: The aristocratic upper class was typically trained in the use of [[:Category:Simple weapons|simple]] and [[:Category:Martial weapons|martial weapons]] and [[shield]]s and in the wearing of [[:Category:Armor|armor]], even though their roles in society did not usually involve combat.
document_data.Notable Aristocrats:
Several famous persons in the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]] were trained specifically as aristocrats; among them were:
* [[Miklos Selkirk]]
* [[Danilo Thann]]
* [[Zelphar Thann]]
